projects.title: MERN Stack template
projects.description: Build a MERN template using TSX and SCSS. Features A ReactJS front-end and an Express back-end with jwt auth and routes with public/private routes

projects.title: Fluid Simulation
projects.description: Basic fluid sim build based off the Navier-Stokes Equations. Uses a grid of average densities/velocities to approximate a particle simulation. Assumes that the fluid is incompressible and that there are no boundaries
